com/en/project/2123/pocket-chicken-family the pocket chicken family includes instructions for crocheting the mother hen baby chick and their nest bed all of the pieces are completely no-sew and crocheted in one piece this beginner-friendly bird doll pattern is quick and easy to work up it can be kept as a squishy plush with super bulky blanket yarn or turned into a small mini keychain with thinner weight yarns it is great as a birthday gift christmas or holiday gift as party favors non candy easter egg stuffers or market/craft fair products kids and children alike will adore these cute barn farm animals **size** height 3 5 9 cm **materials** super bulky 6 yarn in desired colors yarn i used https //hobbii mvk co/2g8s4 8mm plastic safety eyes x2 5mm crochet hook stuffing scissors **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner/intermediate requires familiarity with stitches used below changing colors and attaching yarn **stitches & techniques used us terminology ** fo = fasten_off chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together half_double_crochet =
